title: 08/26/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/26/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the QB situation in New England. Should Mac Jones start over Cam Newton? Chris Simms explains why he's high on Matt Stafford this season. And Actor Adam Sandler joins us from the set of his new movie "Hustle", to discuss McLovin's role in it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the QB situation in New England. Should Mac Jones start over Cam Newton? Chris Simms explains why he's high on Matt Stafford this season. And Actor Adam Sandler joins us from the set of his new movie "Hustle", to discuss McLovin's role in it.
